job.title: NetSuite Sr Software Engineer - Java , AIML, Time Series
job.description: stronguAbout UsbrbrustrongstrongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongOracle NetSuite is looking for an ambitious software engineer for our infrastructure teams to scale out our world leading cloud ERP system The NetSuite application is used by tens of thousands of customers to manage their daytoday business operations The Infrastructure AIOps team offers services to both internal stakeholders and external customers to proactively monitor and predict system health and predict resource consumption We are scaling our services to identify amp remediate problems quickly and accurately We are constantly exploring techniques to do more with less and challenging the status quo We use some of the latest technologies to build the necessary tools to make software scale better and provide end to end monitoring for end users As a part of the AIOps team you will help build out realtime prediction and correlation services to improve the reliability amp performance of the NetSuite servicebrbrstronguAbout YoubrbrustrongYou should be motivated to come up with innovative solutions that helps others extract operational amp usage insights You should enjoy writing production ready code that are testable maintainable and scalable You should be motivated to help other team members adopt good coding standards and enjoy having technical discussions You should be interested in data science and time series analysis You should have experience working with largescale software engineering system designbrbrstronguJob Responsibilitiesbrustrongul li Write production ready code for distributed systems and be committed to solid software engineering principles and test driven development li li Implement and leverage opensource technologies to analyze time series data sets li li Apply ML and AI algorithms and techniques to finding anomaly and outliers in time series li li Leverage your prior experiences to make sound design decisions and build scalable products for stakeholders and our customers li li Empower engineers with delightful webbased tools that allows for prediction correlation and alerting li li Be able to own processes end to end and be ready to fix errors when they surface  be committed to our customers success li brbrulstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongul li BS in Computer Science Computer Engineering or Equivalent li li 4 years of backend software engineering experience li li 4 years of Java or other object oriented programming experience li li NOSQL database experience or working with large data analytics li li Prior distributed tracing or production visibility experience li li Excellent at communicating in both technical and nontechnical contexts li brbrulDesign develop troubleshoot and debug software programs for databases applications tools networks etcbrbrAs a member of the software engineering division you will assist in defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing debugging or designing of software applications or operating systems Provide technical leadership to other software developers Specify design and implement modest changes to existing software architecture to meet changing needsbrbrDuties and tasks are varied and complex needing independent judgment Fully competent in own area of expertise May have project lead role and or supervise lower level personnel BS or MS degree or equivalent experience relevant to functional area 4 years of software engineering or related experiencebrbrstronguAbout UsbrbrustrongInnovation starts with inclusion at Oracle We are committed to creating a workplace where all kinds of people can be themselves and do their best work Its when everyones voice is heard and valued that we are inspired to go beyond whats been done before Thats why we need people with diverse backgrounds beliefs and abilities to help us create the future and are proud to be an affirmativeaction equal opportunity employerbrbrOracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin sexual orientation gender identity disability and protected veterans status age or any other characteristic protected by law Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law
